type customer_accounts_json = Array<{| accountID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, country: String, street: String, state: String, name: String, city: String, postal: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"accountID\\\":5039,\\\"country\\\":\\\"United States\\\",\\\"street\\\":\\\"77 Geary Street\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"California\\\",\\\"name\\\":\\\"Maxine Mule\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"San Francisco\\\",\\\"postal\\\":\\\"94108\\\"},{\\\"accountID\\\":5043,\\\"country\\\":\\\"United States\\\",\\\"street\\\":\\\"77 Geary Street\\\",\\\"state\\\":\\\"California\\\",\\\"name\\\":\\\"Max Mule\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"San Francisco\\\",\\\"postal\\\":\\\"94108\\\"}]"}
